definition: frame (e.g. door frame)/casing/fig. framework/template/to circle (i.e. draw a circle around sth)/to frame/to restrict/Taiwan pr. [kuang1]

sentences.english: How much extraventricular window-frame line are you ordering ?
sentences.chinese: 室外窗框线您预计要订多少？

sentences.english: A window frame made of insulating materials according to the principle of an electric fly-flap.
sentences.chinese: 根据电蚊蝇拍的原理，用绝缘材料做窗框。

sentences.english: All the window frames of the old building have sprung.
sentences.chinese: 这幢旧楼的所有窗框全都翘曲了。

sentences.english: After you are satisfied, please use strength to compaction, let back glue paste on window frame.
sentences.chinese: 满意后用力紧压，让背胶紧贴于窗框。

sentences.english: White of wall be of use, and doorcase and window frame use as same as metope color.
sentences.chinese: 墙顶用白色，而门框及窗框采用与墙面相同的色彩。

sentences.english: Don't forget to put some masking tape on the windows before you paint the frames.
sentences.chinese: 漆窗框时别忘了在玻璃窗上粘遮蔽胶带。

sentences.english: Window frames and shutters are anodised aluminium.
sentences.chinese: 窗框和百叶窗的阳极氧化铝。

sentences.english: He put masking tape round the edges of the glass while he painted the window frame .
sentences.chinese: 他给窗框上漆时，用遮蔽胶带把玻璃边缘贴住。

sentences.english: One of them banged the sash of the window nearest my bed.
sentences.chinese: 其中一个砰地一声击中了离我床边最近的窗框上。

sentences.english: The street-facing facade is punctured by large windows with deep bronzed frames.
sentences.chinese: 面向街道的立面上穿插着有深古铜色窗框的大窗户。

sentences.english: The blind was pulled down to within an inch of the sash so that I could not be seen.
sentences.chinese: 窗帘拉到离地面窗框只有一寸，这样就不会被看到。

sentences.english: The door fits flush into its frame.
sentences.chinese: 门框或窗框的直立的边柱。

sentences.english: The sash is angled to provide a more comfortable operating position than a vertical sash.
sentences.chinese: 倾斜的窗扇提供一个比垂直窗框更舒适的操作位置。

sentences.english: The door is flush with the casing.
sentences.chinese: 门框或窗框的直立的边柱。

sentences.english: Tore open the shutters and threw up the sash.
The window jarred in the frame.
sentences.chinese: 窗子在窗框中嘎嘎作响。

definition: window/the opening panel of a window
door/the opening panel of a door
